text.content:
Psionic aptitude arises naturally in a handful out of every generation, and for most, this blessing means a lifetime of developing their gifts as a Psychic. Instead, you found a different calling. You learned to bind your burgeoning psyche, through drilled techniques or empowering tattoos, and use its warping power as a source of unparalleled fighting techniques.

Dervishes flit through combat, a streaking blur carried aloft by focused psionic power. Their blades quake with the strength of their psyche, striking out with unnatural speed. As a pursuant of this rare fighting style, you bring combat techniques most doubt to be possible without the aid of complex spellwork.

Dervishes tend to be solitary, linking up only to teach, learn, or test themselves. You likely had or have a teacher, but like any mystical path, the true power of the Dervish cannot be taught.

Additional Feats 10th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.04Smj4ZsEBD8WIXv]{Dual-Weapon Blitz}

@UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.sgPrCkIhDs8xd0tO]{Dervish Dedication} Feat 2

You channel the inner strength of your mind, unleashing a barrage of psionic energy through the deadly weapons you wield.

You can cast occult spells using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} activity. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and occult spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for dervish archetype spells is Charisma and they are occult dervish spells.

You gain the psi cantrip @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.wLkMp60XTDQYqV6p]{Psionic Strike} which you can amplify by spending Focus Points. If you don't have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can use to amp your psi cantrips. You can Refocus by meditating on your new powers or performing a physical regimen.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} fighter feat. This serves as Double Slice for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

You gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.YCZg2etveOOeJJJT]{Gather Psi} action that allows you to to use actions with the Psi Burst trait.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the Dervish archetype.

@UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.lnTB0Djhk5SffBVb]{Psionic Movement} Feat 4

Prerequisites Dervish Dedication

You gain the psi cantrip @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.ijnv8dbIc1UrWsXT]{Psionic Movement} and one additional Focus point.

@UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.oqyhoRtfiuW5uJJ5]{Guardian Shield} Feat 6

Prerequisites Dervish Dedication

You get the psi cantrip @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.fpPKRfaKQncXsamA]{Guardian Shield} and one additional Focus Point.

@UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.TvOyV3n37tVZzCEr]{Psychic Lash} Feat 8

Prerequisites Dervish Dedication

You have learned to stretch your psychic influence further, releasing projectiles with a swing of your weapon. When you have psionic focus, you can make a psychic Strike with one of the melee weapons you are wielding; This is a ranged Strike with a maximum range of 30 feet that deals mental damage instead of the weapon's normal damage. Your ranged weapon Strike gains all the benefits of your weapon's runes as long as they still apply to a ranged weapon.

@UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.EhoqdkvvTU1lGXKb]{Ready Mind} Feat 12

Trigger Your turn begins.

Frequency once per minute

Requirements You're in an encounter and you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}.

Your mind is trained to slip into a heightened state at a moment's notice. You immediately @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.dervish.YCZg2etveOOeJJJT]{Gather Psi}.

In addition, your proficiency in occult spell attack rolls and occult spell DCs increases to expert.
